(kanthawange akamaththa ho nodanuwathkama matha siduwana gabganim waladi ema wagakim walin kotasak samajayatada himiwe.)  wiwahaka ho awiwahaka kanthawan pamanak mulikathwaya ganu labana pawulak thula bihiwana daruwange wagakima samajaya washayen pilagatha yuththaki kon kirimata saha wenas kota salakimata bhajanaya nowiya yuthuya.  lingika wruththikayan,aabaditha ho kanthawanata siduwana wenath andamaka apahasuthawayakadi ayata awashya saukhyaya pahasukam labadimedi aya awagnyawata, garahimata ho pidawata lak nowana andamin ayata awashya pahasukami sapayiya yuthuya.  sunami, `gan wathura, naya yam wani hadisi awastha waladi mawwarunge ha daruwange poshanayata ha rakawaranayata awashya katayuthu wahama itukala yuthuya.  stha්ringe nidahasa ha rakiyawe surakshitha bawa rakena aakaraye kamikaru nithi sakasiya yuthuya.  sewa sthana aasha්rithawa mawwarunge ha daruwange poshanaya ha pawathma piliba`dawa thahawuru karanu pinisa niyamitha pa්ramithiyata anukulawa diwasurakum madhyasthana athikirimata katayuthu kala yuthuya.  wathu kamkaru kanthawan athulu siyaluma kamkaru kanthawange wruththiya hethukota gena mathuwanna wu wruththimaya saukhya gatalu rogabadha thaththwayan walakwima ha samanaya kirima sa`daha wada piliwelak diyath kala yuthuya.  samaja aarakshanaya sandaha pawathina labanu siyaluma sewawanhidi samana ayithinak pawathiya yuthu athara mathruthwaya padanam kota genaathiwannawu wenaskam matha wisheshitha sewawan kanathawan sandaha ka්riyathmaka kala yuthuya.  nishpadana karyayedi menma jiwanopayedith kanthawage dayakathwaya ha`dunagena, depala ayithiya, sahabhagithwaya saha pa්rathilabha sambandhayen samana ha sadharana kotas kanthawanta labena bawa sahathika kerena piyawara gatha yuthuya.  janathawa sathuwa pawathina swayan thirana game ayithiya thahawuru karana akaraye balaya bediemi ka්ramewidayak godanagiya yuthuya.  yuddhayen awathan wu thama gam bim thula kanthawan yali padinchi kota owunge jiwana marga sthapitha kala yuthuya.  pa්radhana dharawe ha anekuth sanniewidana madhya magin kanthawa hisanayata ha apahasuthawayata path karana eeka parshawiya lesa katayuthu kirima waha nawathiya yuthuya.  uthure dakune - rata pura kanthawan ha lamayin pawichwi kirima walakwimata kangnam piyawara gatha yuthuya  kanthawanta aarthika, samaja, sanskruthika, deshapalana ha siwil ayithiwasikam samana lesa bhukthi wi`dime ayithiya sahathika kirima.  kanthawan piliba`dawa rate ka්riyathmaka wana pa්radhana pa්rathipaththinhidi stha්ri purusha samajabhawaya piliba`da wisheshayen ka්riyakirimata yomukarawima.  sanwardhana karyayata dayaka wana siyaluma kanthawanta samana awastha sapaya ganima sahathika kirima saha adhyapanika, puhunu katayuthu waladi stha්ri purusha deparshawayata samana awastha sapayaganima sahathika kirima.  thirana ganime siyalu bala wyuhayan thula gunathmaka kantha niyojanaya siyayata 50 dakwa wardhanaya kirimata awashya piyawara ganima.
